s_synopsis: The planet Velldeselba has long been in a state of turmoil, with fighting continuing between the Kingdom of Gidan, the Munogi Federation, and the independent state of Noipask. Misaki, a young space pilot, had to make an emergency crash landing on Velldeselba, and washed up on the shore of Noipask. Sensing his potential, he was quickly recruited to join the Noipask army and help the country in their struggle to remain independent.
